message: lint + js files inside dist folder

Added layoutEnd event for split component, it is hooked up to
transitionend events of the split areas, after show/hide animations
finishes.

Also, upgrade Angular 2 to 2.4.3.
update version to 0.2.2 with UMD export

update cypress version and tests, add ones for dblclick and gutterStep
refactor npm scripts + add cypress tests for lazy loaded module
